snippet.title: SPELLHACK!! Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
SPELLHACK!! is a fast-paced roguelike deckbuilder blending survival and tower defense elements! Explore Doom City to collect and upgrade Technospells during the day, and defend against relentless waves of Summoned Beasts at night in this totally rad roguelike!!

Wishlist on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2889780/SPELLHACK/

And join other Spellhackers in the Discord!
https://discord.gg/BGrbk27eh5
